SamPy.bolshoi.testLightcone.plot_number_counts¶

SamPy.bolshoi.testLightcone.plot_number_counts(path, database, band, redshifts, out_folder, obs_data, area=2.1978021978021975, ymin=1000, ymax=2000000, xmin=0.5, xmax=100, nbins=15, sigma=3.0, write_out=False)¶

160 (arcminutes squared) = 0.0444444444 square degrees, thus, the weighting is 1/0.044444444 i.e. 22.5.

Parameters:
  • sigma – sigma level of the errors to be plotted
  • nbins – number of bins (for simulated data)
  • area – actually 1 / area, used to weight galaxies
